title: Sky News Arabia
description:
The Sky News Arabia app provides comprehensive coverage of the regional and international news headlines; delivered by more than 250 multimedia journalists and broadcasting to over 50 million households. It provides you with the latest news with speed & accuracy right from the heart of events. The daily content offers a wide variety of breaking news & featured stories across politics, sport, business, science, health, technology & life style.
Key Features:
•	Subscribe to the latest Breaking news notifications and rich media alerts.
•	Watch Sky News Arabia live or listen to the Sky News Arabia radio channel from anywhere around the world.
•	Get the latest news, videos and image galleries and documentaries from Middle East, world, business, sports, technology and life style right at your fingertips.
•	Get instant access to our most popular news in real time.
•	Stay connected with highlights of today’s top news via our Daily Digest.
•	Catch up on the latest episodes from your best-loved programs anytime on-demand.
•	Listen to Sky News Arabia latest podcasts and radio programs.
•	Save your favorite content in “My News” page.
•	Browse and follow your choice of topics & programs and get alerted via a personalized notification of the latest news updates.
•	Stay up to date by subscribing to the latest news updates from Sky News Arabia via WhatsApp; Facebook Messenger or Telegram.
